title: French Language Pack for Office 2013 (x86) - August 2015
description:
*******************************************************************
French Language Pack for Office 2013 (x86) - Updated 23 August 2015
*******************************************************************

Language packs let you see ribbon or menu items, commands, Help, and proofing tools like the spelling checker, grammar checker, and thesaurus in a translated version of Office for all Office applications.

========
Features
========

- Translates Office user interface: Access, Excel, InfoPath, One Drive Entreprise, OneNote, Outlook, PowerPoint, Project, Publisher, SharePoint Designer, Visio, and Word
- Translates Office Help content
- Includes proofing tools: spelling checker, grammar checker, and thesaurus (German, English, Arabic, French, Dutch, Spanish)

=====================
This release includes
=====================

1. Microsoft Office Language Pack 2013- French/FranÃƒÂ§ais
2. Microsoft Project Language Pack 2013- French/FranÃƒÂ§ais
3. Microsoft Visio Language Pack 2013- French/FranÃƒÂ§ais

=====
Notes
=====

- The language pack can be installed over any 32-bit version of Office 2013
- This release includes all updates available by 23/08/2015
- Install: Mount / Unpack and run Setup.exe
- French Language Pack for Office 2013 (x64) will follow soon
- PLEASE KEEP SEEDING FOR A WHILE

========================================
File: Off.15.LangPack.Fr.x86.Aug2015.iso
========================================
